Powerful Features

Everything you need for productive remote collaboration. Built with cutting-edge technology to deliver exceptional user experiences.

HD Video Calls

High-quality video calls with multiple participants and reliable connection.

Real-time Chat

Instant messaging during calls with emoji reactions and file sharing.

Screen Sharing

Share your screen for presentations and collaborative work sessions.

Group Meetings

Host meetings with multiple participants and easy room management.

Mobile Friendly

Responsive design that works seamlessly on desktop and mobile devices.

Secure Meetings

Protected meeting rooms with user authentication and privacy controls.

Ready to Transform your meetings?

Join thousands of teams already using MeetVault for seamless collaboration. Experience the future of remote work today.

Modern Tech Stack

Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS

Secure Authentication

JWT-based auth with protected routes

Real-time Features

WebRTC and Socket.io for live communication

Responsive Design

Mobile-first approach with modern UI
